Actions.Text: ----------------------------------------------------------------# Auth: Christopher Stone <scriptmeister@thestoneforge.com># dCre: 2014/10/05 11:02# dMod: 2017/03/02 09:44# Appl: Finder & System Events & Keyboard Maestro# Task: Expand/Contract Name Column in List-View to fit# Libs: GLb# Osax: None# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @Finder, @System_Events, @Expand, @Name, @Column# Test: OSX 10.10.5----------------------------------------------------------------try		tell application "Finder"				set frontmost to true				if current view of front window ≠ list view ¬			then error "View of front Finder window is not list view!"	end tell		tell application "System Events"		set quit delay to 0				tell application "System Events"			tell application process "Finder"				tell (first window whose subrole is "AXStandardWindow")					tell static text 2 of scroll area 1 of splitter group 1 of splitter group 1						set {x, Y} to position												set x to x - 10						set Y to Y + 5											end tell				end tell							end tell					end tell			end tell		tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"		setvariable "X" to x		setvariable "Y" to Y	end tell	on error e number n	set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n	if n ≠ -128 then		tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to button returned of ¬			(display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬				default button "OK" giving up after 30)		if ddButton = "Copy" then set the clipboard to e	end ifend try----------------------------------------------------------------
Actions.Path: ~/Documents/Application Support Files/Keyboard Maestro User Files/AppleScript Support/Finder/Window ⇢ Resize Name Column.scpt

Name: Window ⇢ Resize Name Column ⇢ Text Script
